attributes.action: "....stop using the excuse of terror and tyrant as a just reason to invade muslim countries..."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ... look around you all... let see... what countries are we invading.. emmm... yeh we are.... muslim ones... we dont see and invasion of non-muslim countries... no we dont..... so why not stop think... let be honest there is no reakl reason to threaten iran... we only do it as mr blairs freind mr goerge bush coincidently his initials are GB!!! this war on muslims countries just because we say they are tyrants isnt just! no no no

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/rethinkwar/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
